short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clearly see sponsored products on Amazon. Buy better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Amazon ads exposed" let you see clearly all the sponsored products on searches and product pages. It is a tool for conscious consumers and for people that love understanding what are they are buying. 

The plugin is designed for intercepting ads on amazon.com, co.uk, .de, .fr, .it, .es, .ca, .com.br, .com.mx, .com.au, .nl, .in, .co.jp, .cn, .com.be, .eg, .pl, .sa, .sg, .co.za, .ae, .com.tr, and .se.

Amazon ads exposed is a project designed by me, Antonio Patti (Head of Digital Products) and developed by Claude (Anthropic AI).   

Visit my site for collaborations and more projects.
https://www.antoniopatti.it/projects/
